attributes.action: Find out how much every person on welfare benefits is spending on tobacco products and reduce their benefits by that amount.
attributes.additional_details: I stopped smoking decades ago because I could not afford it.  I am a tax paying pensioner and it is immoral that my taxes are being handed over in welfare benefits to people who spend it on tobacco products which I have CHOSEN not to use.  Anybody who smokes (or drinks alcohol) should have their benefits reduced.  Welfare benefits are for survival, not to fund entertainment and pleasure.
